淁字的基本解释

淁
qiè
水名。

淁
jí
古同“潗”。

淁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiè］
［《廣韻》七接切，入葉，精。］
(1)水名。
(2)水支流。
[②]［jí］
［《集韻》即入切，入緝，精。］
同“潗1”。

淁字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　淁； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页628第30
【唐韻】【集韻】?七接切，音妾。【說文】水也。　又【集韻】卽涉切，音接。水名。　又卽入切，音㗱。與潗同。水瀵也。一曰水微轉細通貌。

淁字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
淁字的起名意思

暂无。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
qiè
Water name.
Sorrow
jí
The ancient same "潗".
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiè］
["Guangyun" seven cuts, into the leaves, fine. ]
(1) Water name.
(2) Water tributaries.
[②]［jí］
["Ji Yun" is cut, cut, and refined. ]
Same as "潗1".
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Siji 1】【Shuizi Department】　淁; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: page 628 30
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Seven cuts, sound concubine. [Said the text] Water also.　[Jiyun] 卽 involved cutting, phonetic connection. Water name.　Into the cut again, sound 㗱. Same as 潗. Water 瀵 also. One said that the water turned slightly to reveal its appearance.
Sorrow
